name: KaleidoWorld
description:
In Kaleidoworld you will control the fates of two opposing races: the humans and the monsters.

Use the left and right arrow keys or A and D to rotate the sun around the planet. The sun will cause the temperature to rise, allowing humans to appear! However, on the opposite side of the planet, the temperature will go down, and monsters will be born.

The world will visually change based on each zone's temperature. If a zone has both factions living in it, they will start fighting when there's no more space for growth. 

Whoever has the numerical advantage will win, unless you help them out by changing the temperature to overgroth their adversaries once more! Will one civilization overtake the other? 

Or will you find balance? After all four regions have been overtaken by either faction, the game will end.
